title: The Ghost
writer: Ali Lucknowi, Abhijeeth Poondla, Praveen Sattaru
short_cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni, Sonal Chauhan, Gul Panag, Anikha Surendran, Manish Chaudhary, Ravi Varma, Srikanth Iyengar, Bilal Hussain
cast: Nagarjuna Akkineni, Sonal Chauhan, Gul Panag, Anikha Surendran, Manish Chaudhary, Ravi Varma, Srikanth Iyengar, Bilal Hussain
genre: Telugu-Language Movies, Crime Movies, Action & Adventure
desc: A former agent with a troubled past unleashes his lethal skills to protect his sister and her daughter from kidnappers, rivals and death itself.
